Title: How to build tables in Oracle 1

pages.title: Tutorial Introduction
pages.text: Tutorials are sets of instructions and queries that may be provided by your professor or others.

scripts.note: Here is the first script in the tutorial.
scripts.textBeforeQuery:
This is the text 
hi
that goes before
scripts.sql:
SELECT first_name
 ,last_name
 ,phone
 ,email
FROM customer
WHERE state = 'UT'
ORDER BY last_name, first_name

scripts.note: Here is the second script in the tutorial.

 ,last_name
 ,phone
 ,email
FROM customer
WHERE state = 'UT'
ORDER BY last_name, first_name
